actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to revise the boundaries of the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument, and for other purposes.
short_title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1993

summary.text: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1993 - Amends the Arizona-Idaho Conservation Act of 1988 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified lands for inclusion within the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument.

titles.title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1993
A bill to revise the boundaries of the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument, and for other purposes.
